alert.note: Alert for Des Moines (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 3:30AM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch possible. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Iowa, Des Moines County. In Illinois, Henry IL, Bureau and Mercer Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel may become hazardous due to snow and ice covered roads and at times very low visibility. This will affect both the Thursday morning and afternoon commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
